description.value:
Requirements You are wielding a shield.

Attacks with your shield knock the sense out of your foes. Make a shield bash, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Shield Boss], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Shield Spikes] Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} until the start of your next turn (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} on a critical hit). If your shield is a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Tower Shield], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Fortress Shield], or another shield that grants a higher circumstance bonus to AC when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover] behind it, the creature is instead stupefied 2 if you hit and deal damage to it (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} on a critical hit).
